RTCPeerConnectionConnectionstatechange_e.summary:
The connectionstatechange event is sent to the onconnectionstatechange event handler on an object after a new track has been added to an which is part of the connection.
The new connection state can be found in , and is one of the string values: new, connecting, connected, disconnected, failed, or closed.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
